    # File spaceship/lib/spaceship/portal/portal_base.rb, line 6
def client
  require_relative 'spaceship'
  (
    @client or
    Spaceship::Portal.client or
    raise "Please login using `Spaceship::Portal.login('user', 'password')`"
  )
end
